--- title: "Geog 531: Quantitative Methods in Geographic Research" date: last-modified date-format: medium format: html: theme: flatly link-external-newwindow: true toc: true toc_float: true toc_depth: 3 --- ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### Instructor Information **Instructor:** Dr. Varun Goel **Office:** Callcott 111 \ **Appointment link:** [Click Here](https://outlook.office.com/bookwithme/user/675339bb37584ebaa37d12437cb4f286@sc.edu/meetingtype/aKkUKwRTska6ndT42c8OWg2?anonymous&ep=mlink) **Email:** varungoel\@sc.edu ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### Course Essentials **Meeting times:** Monday, Wednesday *3:55 pm - 5:10pm*\ **Meeting location:** Callcott 302 **Student Support Hours:** Mon-Wed 2 pm - 3 pm **Appointment link:** [Click Here](https://outlook.office.com/bookwithme/user/675339bb37584ebaa37d12437cb4f286@sc.edu/meetingtype/aKkUKwRTska6ndT42c8OWg2?anonymous&ep=mlink) **\]GEOG 531 Discussion Google Sheet:** [Click Here soon](https://piazza.com/sc/spring2025/geog510/home) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### Updated Syllabus The latest class syllabus can downloaded [here](Geog531_FA25_QuantitativeMethods.pdf){target="_blank"} ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### Updated Schedule ------------------------------------------------------------------------ Please note that this schedule is subject to change (specifically, lecture topics and due dates). WEEK TUES THUR TOPICS DELIVERABLES NOTES
1 01/13/24 01/15/24 Introduction to GEOG 510 and Health Geography; Geographic Concepts and GIS

3 01/27/24 01/29/24 Introduction to Spatial Health Data;
4 02/03/24 02/05/24 A#1 Virtual/Recorded

6 02/17/24 02/19/24 Mapping Health Information and Design; ; GIS Overlay, Distance, Buffer
7 02/24/24 02/26/24 Pattern and Process; Spatial Neighbors and Autocorrelation, Spatial Variation and Clustering
8 03/03/24 03/05/24 Disease Clusters; Grouping and Regionalization A#2
9 Spring Break
10 03/17/24 03/19/24 Applied Autocorrelation/Clustering/Grouping A#3
11 03/24/24 03/26/24 NO CLASS: Away for conference Virtual/Recorded
12 03/31/24 04/02/24 Disease Risk and Diffusion; Ecology of Disease A#4
13 04/07/24 04/09/24 Correlation, Regression, Confounding
14 04/14/24 04/16/24 Spatial Regression Techniques; Temporal Analysis and Change Detection
15 04/21/24 04/23/24 Neighborhoods and Health A#5
